column1: #Text=Korra says : " Mako , I missed you so much ! "
#Text=Mako says : " Korra ... hey , I - I missed you , too .
#Text=I got attacked by a dark spirit and I lost my memory for a little while .
#Text=Maybe it has n't all come back yet .
#Text=So you were back with Asami , but then Korra came back and thought you guys were still together and you did n't tell her you were n't ?
#Text=" Yin says : " Just like your grandfather .
#Text=" Mako says : " Well , me and Asami were never officially back together .
#Text=You know , it seems like you 're so afraid to disappoint anyone that you end up disappointing everyone .
#Text=" Wu says : " Truer words have never been spoken .
#Text=" Mako says : " Well , eventually , I did tell Korra .
